text: donna why don't you go home you know i

for trial

i think maybe lewis was right you think
lewis was right about what maybe he
should be handling my case
okay well that's how you feel i knew it
i knew you would take this as an insult
how exactly would you like me to take it
i would like you to take it seriously
and talk about it with me
okay donna why exactly would you prefer
lewis to handle this
because i sat in that arraignment today
and it hit me for the first time that i
might actually go to prison
and you are more concerned with

with me
so you think lewis is right i piss off

because he's coming at us
and you're pouring gas on the fire
because that's what i do and i don't

how i do my job

what why am i there because i'm getting
ready for a fight and you're telling me
you don't think i can win i'm not
telling you that i'm telling you that
i'm petrified and i understand but i
don't have time to comfort you well i
need you to make time and i can't
because
this is my life

when i told lewis how you got me out of
this thing
he told me how scared he was at the

just need
you too

makes me want to drop to my knees
you want to hear me say it there it is
